text: qul - 'ayuha alrasul - lhm: man kan dalana ean alhaqu ghyr mtbe tariq alhda, fallah ymhlh wymly lah fi dlalh, hataa 'iidha ra'aa - yaqinana - ma tweeadh allah bh: 'iimaa aleadhab aleajil fi aldnya, wa'iimaa qiam alsaet, fsyelm - hinayidh - man hu sharun mkanana wmstqrana, wa'adeaf quatan wjndana
